Reviews.Title: “It is great...if you can find it!”

Reviews.Content: went onto priceline booked hotel room disgusting hotel ever stayed arrived hotel outside appearance fair nothing wrong however opened hotel door bad inside checking receptionist bring bags room find pizza states people rooms running pizza business inside garage several guests complained found odd take comforter everyone knows hardly ever get washed sheets always washed law well remove comforter fix sheets felt really hard spot blankets made look closer find several hairs sheets absolutely disgusting immediately went receptionist called priceline requesting immediate refund booked room marina inn virtually price room sheets actually cleaned please stay hotel

Reviews.Content: stuck put unit repaired 10 days started ok transferred comfort inn road nice newer larger room contemporary decor almost full kitchen bonus well stuck first floor across housekeeping literally door away front desk heard every guest coming going walls paper thin heard tvs late night peoples loud hours housekeeping would start early morning yelling right outside door greeting smile one morning hallway outside door beginning tried ignore finally called front desk ask early said 8 never stayed vacuumed early told started 8 said sorry corporate coming today said guess care corporate customers offered weak apology offer way trouble wireless internet even got excellent signal pretty slow 7 day stay one maid service additional cleaning 510 stay fewer 7 days get cleaning front desk hit miss friendly helpful definitely seemed like new job 11 pm one night past time noticed cigarette smoke odor coming bathroom called front desk complain since sensitive smoke said would call around see might smoking policy highly doubt actually called every room 1130 pm whether smoking would never stay extended unfortunately prior stay booked night priceline lets hope location better better stay place youre visiting san

Reviews.Title: “I was very impressed with this hotel, great service and acted like a 4/5* hotel”
Reviews.Author: smeedudet
Reviews.Content: perfect christmas markets stayed weekend break see frankfurt also visit xmas markets great hotel located within short walk train station trains never problem always time family day card 5 6 euro hotel easy find outside area kept clean tidy lobby good seating walked reception quick efficient gave us lots info asked check quick took lift get rooms good standard bright airy nice seperate area husband son stayed son pull bed living area pull bed wasnt comfy could extra duvet apart job teacoffee making facilities room also mini bar also television plenty storage space seperate bedroom lovely comfy kingsized bed seperate television also good storage space gripe channels almost resulted highly moments occasions also pillows terrible could filled bathroom fine lots storage although water shower came almost fast pressure worked could done providing dressing gowns added touch especially useful go pool two daughters seperate twin room layout room didnt realise til got could booked superior room extra euros 5 us 4 family may wise something book return hotel added bonus swimming pool steam room sauna massage solarium also great kids table football kids loved spent evenings mentioned use dressing gowns would good pool husband didnt breakfast extra found expensive 3 children free breakfast day included price perfect hungry wasnt 2nd morning realised could actually free breakfast lobby went locate eventually found tucked behind area next stairs reception enjoyed croissants teacoffee nice little touch would better found day food found great chinese shop close supermarket enjoyed lovely take away food two occasions great stock beer treats etc go hotel turn left walk crossing turn right cross road opposite flower shop carry walking past police station fantastic hotel great price location problem friendly helpful staff would 100 come back stay

Reviews.Content: trip advisor good rating would used hotel better average doesnt really good room reasonably priced wasnt impressed area arrived although hotel close metro room good size clean free wifi room breakfast excellent rather grumpy unhelpful front desk arrived got impression staff dont speak much english

Reviews.Content: hotel much anything across strip road side metro station however easy access anywhere madrid two metro lines nearby even quick trip airport train really made hotel fantastic fitness room isnt gym access guest room type offers huge amount space equipment room since work get early came back relatively late get gym equipment room excellent great bed comfortable excellent staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Good Location”
Reviews.Author: johno.franklin
Reviews.Content: business trip madrid second time first hotel stayed 6 nights reach hotel metro taxi around 28 euros hotel situated next one largest metro stations train station also 5 minutes walk famous 4 plaza de easily reach sol metro line 1 take straight crowded place madrid 15 minutes everything hotel actually looking building train metro station also left see straight ahead old construction ground need room view city like madrid time rooms spacious extremely clean bathroom large things need since unfortunately didnt get luggage upon arrival sunday couldnt find place buy basic pleasantly surprised see bath toothbrush room breakfast huge selection pastries complete continental breakfast cheese fruits special con chocolate must try sort chocolate natural orange juice great coffee really theres nothing miss go back home staff reception helpful ask anything try help ask city map arrive also free wifi room need ask password reception every next day signal good every floor since hotel everything need center city easily would recommend everyone occasion

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”

Reviews.Content: lovely big bedrooms great service front desk although based central madrid tube stops places want go hotel right next tube station nice quieter night time breakfast great could see tried staff helpful breakfast room
